
* Scopus Chemical engineering departments publication analysis :archive:

Ranking data from here
http://grad-schools.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-graduate-schools/top-engineering-schools/chemical-engineering-rankings

http://www.university-list.net/us/rank/univ-20121038.htm

Data is in [[id:ECA0C25D-E471-43AD-8CCC-A8AE143BEC58][Data]], and was downloaded manually from scopus by searching for institution affiliation, chemical engineering and sometimes a city.

A limitation of this data is that the queries were all of the form affil(university) and affil(chemical engineering), which may overcount by matching in separate affiliations compared to affil(university and chemical engineering) which makes sure these both are in one affiliation.

#+BEGIN_SRC python :var cmu=cmu-cheme stanford=stanford-cheme princeton=princeton-cheme delaware=delaware-cheme gatech=gatech-cheme mit=MIT-cheme minnesota=minnesota-cheme bk=berkeley-cheme uw=uw-cheme ucsb=ucsb-cheme caltech=caltech-cheme austin=ut-austin-cheme
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.plot([year for (year, N) in mit], [N for (year, N) in mit], label='MIT (1)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in caltech], [N for (year, N) in caltech], label='CalTech (2)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in bk], [N for (year, N) in bk], label='Berkeley (3)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in gatech], [N for (year, N) in gatech], label='Ga Tech (10)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in minnesota], [N for (year, N) in minnesota], label='Minnesota (4)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in stanford], [N for (year, N) in stanford], label='Stanford (4)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in princeton], [N for (year, N) in princeton], label='Princeton (6)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in delaware], [N for (year, N) in delaware], label='Delaware (11)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in uw], [N for (year, N) in uw], label='UW-Madison (6)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in austin], [N for (year, N) in austin], label='UT Austin (6)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in ucsb], [N for (year, N) in ucsb], label='UCSB (9)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in cmu], [N for (year, N) in cmu], 'k-', linewidth=2, label='CMU (13)')

plt.legend(loc='best')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('# publications')
plt.savefig('top-10-publications.png')
#+END_SRC

#+RESULTS:

[[./top-10-publications.png]]

* Scopus website historical publication rates

I am redoing this analysis so that the institution and department are in one affiliation.

#+BEGIN_SRC python :var cmu=cmu stanford=stanford princeton=princeton delaware=delaware gatech=gatech mit=MIT minnesota=minnesota bk=uc-berkeley uw=uw-madison ucsb=ucsb caltech=caltech austin=ut-austin
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.plot([year for (year, N) in mit], [N for (year, N) in mit], label='MIT (1)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in caltech], [N for (year, N) in caltech], label='CalTech (2)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in gatech], [N for (year, N) in gatech], label='Ga Tech (10)')

plt.plot([year for (year, N) in austin], [N for (year, N) in austin], '--', label='UT Austin (6)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in bk], [N for (year, N) in bk], label='Berkeley (3)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in minnesota], [N for (year, N) in minnesota], label='Minnesota (4)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in stanford], [N for (year, N) in stanford], label='Stanford (4)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in princeton], [N for (year, N) in princeton], '.-', label='Princeton (6)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in delaware], [N for (year, N) in delaware], label='Delaware (11)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in uw], [N for (year, N) in uw], label='UW-Madison (6)')

plt.plot([year for (year, N) in ucsb], [N for (year, N) in ucsb], '.-', label='UCSB (9)')
plt.plot([year for (year, N) in cmu], [N for (year, N) in cmu], 'k-', linewidth=2, label='CMU (13)')

plt.xlim([2000, 2014])
plt.ylim([0, 450])
plt.legend(loc='best')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('# publications')
plt.savefig('redone-top-10-publications.png')
#+END_SRC

#+RESULTS:

[[./redone-top-10-publications.png]]

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

resp = requests.get("http://api.elsevier.com/content/serial/title?issn=0002-7863&field=SJR,SNIP&view=STANDARD",
                    headers={'Accept':'application/xml',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})

results = ET.fromstring(resp.text.encode('utf-8'))
print results.find("entry/SJRList/SJR[@year='2013']").text

print resp.text

for el in  results:
    print el.tag, el.attrib

for el in results.find('entry'):
    print el.tag, el.attrib
print

# source normalized
for el in results.find('entry/SNIPList'):
    print el.tag, el.attrib
print

# prestige
for el in results.find('entry/SJRList'):
    print el.tag, el.attrib
print
#+END_SRC

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(massachusetts institute of technology and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-MIT-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-MIT-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-MIT-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(california institute of technology and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-caltech-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-caltech-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[str(key.encode('utf-8')), journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

*** Faculty distribution of papers

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-caltech-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(georgia institute of technology and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-GaTech-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-GaTech-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-GaTech-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

from scopus_xml import *

title_text = ''

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)

    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = getattr(coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType'), 'text', None)
    if type == 'Journal':
        title = coredata.find('{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title').text.encode('utf-8')
        title_text += ' ' + title

print title_text

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 200

QUERY = 'affil(university of texas and chemical engineering and austin) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-utaustin-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-utaustin-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-utaustin-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 200

QUERY = 'affil(university of california and chemical engineering and berkeley) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})

EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-berkeley-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-berkeley-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-berkeley-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

from scopus_xml import *

    for eid in EIDS:
        results = get_abstract_info(eid)
        coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

        type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
        if type == 'Journal':
            f.write('<li>{}</li>'.format(get_html_citation(eid)))

    f.write('</ol>')

** (216) Minnesota ChemE publications in 2014 from Scopus


#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(university of minnesota and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-Minnesota-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-Minnesota-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-Minnesota-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(stanford university and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={query}&field=eid&count={count}&start={start}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(query=QUERY, count=1, start=0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(query=QUERY, count=count, start=i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-Stanford-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-Stanford-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-Stanford-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['Name', 'count'])

    for eid in EIDS:
        results = get_abstract_info(eid)
        coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

        type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
        if type == 'Journal':
            f.write('<li>{}</li>'.format(get_html_citation(eid)))

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(university of delaware and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-UD-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-UD-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-UD-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-UD-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

with open('UD-department-2014-bibliography.html', 'w') as f:
    f.write('<h1>2014 UD-ChemE Publications</h1>')
    f.write('<ol>')

    for eid in EIDS:
        results = get_abstract_info(eid)
        coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

        type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
        if type == 'Journal':
            f.write('<li>{}</li>'.format(get_html_citation(eid)))

    f.write('</ol>')
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-UD-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

title_text = ''

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)

    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = getattr(coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType'), 'text', None)
    if type == 'Journal':
        title = coredata.find('{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title').text.encode('utf-8')
        title_text += ' ' + title

print title_text
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 200

QUERY = 'affil(university of colorado and chemical engineering and boulder) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-ucboulder-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-ucboulder-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-ucboulder-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(princeton university and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-Princeton-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-Princeton-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

*** Faculty distribution of papers

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-Princeton-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(purdue university and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-Purdue-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-Purdue-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

*** Faculty distribution of papers

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-Purdue-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

        type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
        if type == 'Journal':
            f.write('<li>{}</li>'.format(get_html_citation(eid)))

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 200

QUERY = 'affil(university of michigan and chemical engineering and ann arbor) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-umich-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-umich-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-umich-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(northwestern university and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-northwestern-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-Northwestern-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

*** Faculty distribution of papers

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-Northwestern-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-Northwestern-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

with open('Northwestern-department-2014-bibliography.html', 'w') as f:
    f.write('<h1>2014 ChemE Publications</h1>')
    f.write('<ol>')

    for eid in EIDS:
        results = get_abstract_info(eid)
        coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

        type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
        if type == 'Journal':
            f.write('<li>{}</li>'.format(get_html_citation(eid)))

    f.write('</ol>')

*** 2014 citation count
#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-Northwestern-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

cite_count = 0
for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    count = coredata.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}citedby-count').text
    cite_count += int(count)

print cite_count

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 200

QUERY = 'affil(university of wisconsin and chemical engineering and madison) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-uwisconsin-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-uwisconsin-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-uwisconsin-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['name', 'count'])

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :exports none
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

resp = requests.get("http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query=affil(carnegie mellon university and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014&field=eid&count=0",
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})

EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
i = 0; count = 100
while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get("http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query=affil(carnegie mellon university and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014&field=eid&count=100&start={}".format(i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()
    EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']["entry"]]
    i += count
    N -= count

with open('2014-CMU-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

*** Types of entries

#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *
with open('2014-CMU-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]
types = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    if results.tag == 'service-error':
        print 'no results for {}'.format(eid)
        continue
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type in types:
        types[type] += 1
    else:
        types[type] = 1

print types

*** Which journals do we publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-CMU-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

*** Author distribution of papers

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-CMU-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['Name', 'count'])

*** Our department bibliography for 2014
#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-CMU-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

with open('department-2014-bibliography.html', 'w') as f:
    f.write('<h1>2014 CMU-ChemE Publications</h1>')
    f.write('<ol>')

    for eid in EIDS:
        results = get_abstract_info(eid)
        if results.tag == 'service-error': continue

        coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

        type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
        if type == 'Journal':
            f.write('<li>{}</li>'.format(get_html_citation(eid)))

    f.write('</ol>')

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :exports none
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

resp = requests.get("http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query=affil(university of illinois and chemical engineering and urbana) AND pubyear is 2014&field=eid&count=0",
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})

EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
i = 0; count = 100
while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get("http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query=affil(university of illinois and chemical engineering and urbana) AND pubyear is 2014&field=eid&count=100&start={}".format(i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()
    EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']["entry"]]
    i += count
    N -= count

with open('2014-illinois-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *
with open('2014-illinois-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]
types = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    if results.tag == 'service-error':
        print 'no results for {}'.format(eid)
        continue
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type in types:
        types[type] += 1
    else:
        types[type] = 1

print types

*** Which journals do we publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-illinois-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-illinois-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['Name', 'count'])
#+END_SRC

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 100

QUERY = 'affil(university of california and santa barbara and chemical engineering) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-UCSB-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))
#+END_SRC

from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-UCSB-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-UCSB-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

#+BEGIN_SRC python
import requests
import json
from my_scopus import MY_API_KEY
from scopus_xml import *

i = 0; count = 200

QUERY = 'affil(university of Pennsylvania and chemical engineering and philadelphia) AND pubyear is 2014'
URL = "http://api.elsevier.com/content/search/scopus?query={0}&field=eid&count={1}&start={2}"

resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, 0, 0),
                    headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                             'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})


EIDS = []
results = resp.json()
N = int(results['search-results']['opensearch:totalResults'])
print N

while N > 0:
    resp = requests.get(URL.format(QUERY, count, i),
                        headers={'Accept':'application/json',
                                 'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})
    results = resp.json()

    if 'entry' in results['search-results']:
        EIDS += [str(r['eid']) for r in results['search-results']['entry']]
    i += count
    N -= count
    print '{} are left'.format(N)

with open('2014-upenn-Cheme-EIDS', 'w') as f:
    for eid in EIDS:
        f.write('{}\n'.format(eid))

*** Which journals do they publish in?
#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return journal_table
from scopus_xml import *

with open('2014-upenn-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None: journal = journal.text

        if journal in journals:
            journals[journal] += 1
        else:
            journals[journal] = 1

journal_table = [['Journal', '#Publications'], None]
for key in sorted(journals.keys()):
    journal_table +=  [[key, journals[key]]]

*** Faculty distribution of papers

#+BEGIN_SRC python :results value :return counts_view
from scopus_xml import *
import re

counts = {}

with open('2014-upenn-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')

    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        authors = results.find('./{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}authors')

        for author in authors:
            name = author.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/ani/common}indexed-name').text
            auid = author.attrib['auid']

            key = '{0} {1}'.format(name, auid)
            if key in counts:
                counts[key] += 1
            else:
                counts[key] = 1

from operator import itemgetter
counts_view = [(k, v) for k,v in counts.iteritems() ]
counts_view.sort(reverse=True, key=itemgetter(1))

counts_view.insert(0, None)
counts_view.insert(0, ['count', 'name'])

#+BEGIN_SRC python
from scopus_xml import *
import json, os

os.unlink('impact-factors.json')

def get_journal_impact(issn):
    if os.path.exists('impact-factors.json'):
        with open('impact-factors.json') as f:
            data = json.loads(f.read())
    else:
        data = {}

    if issn in data:
        return data[issn]
    else:
        resp = requests.get("http://api.elsevier.com/content/serial/title/issn={issn}&field=SJR,SNIP&view=STANDARD".format(issn=issn),
                            headers={'Accept':'application/xml',
                                     'X-ELS-APIKey': MY_API_KEY})

        results = ET.fromstring(resp.text.encode('utf-8'))
        SJR = getattr(results.find("entry/SJRList/SJR[@year='2013']"), 'text', None)
        SNIP = getattr(results.find("entry/SNIPList/SNIP[@year='2013']"), 'text', None)
        data[issn] = (SJR, SNIP)

        with open('impact-factors.json', 'w') as f:
            f.write(json.dumps(data))

    return data[issn]

with open('2014-berkeley-Cheme-EIDS') as f:
    EIDS = [eid.strip() for eid in f.readlines()]

journals = {}
journal_table = []

for eid in EIDS:
    results = get_abstract_info(eid)
    coredata = results.find('{http://www.elsevier.com/xml/svapi/abstract/dtd}coredata')
    type = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}aggregationType').text
    if type == 'Journal':
        journal = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}publicationName')
        if journal is not None:
            journal = journal.text
            issn = coredata.find('{http://prismstandard.org/namespaces/basic/2.0/}issn').text
            sjr, snip = get_journal_impact(issn)

            if journal not in journals:
                journal_table += [[journal, issn, sjr, snip]]
                journals[journal] = [journal, issn, sjr, snip]

for row in journal_table:
    print '| {0} | {1} | {2} | {3} |'.format(*row)
#+END_SRC

* Executive summary
This document summarizes a study of the publications and citations of the top 20 chemical engineering departments.

The data was obtained from Scopus using a query like "AFFIL=(university name and chemical engineering)". In some cases a city was used, e.g. Austin, Boulder, Berkeley, Santa Barbara, or Philadelphia, if the university name was insufficient.
Scopus is most reliable past 1995.

Ranking data is from here http://www.university-list.net/us/rank/univ-20121038.htm

The number of publications for approximately the top 10 schools can be seen in Fig. ref:fig-top10. It is evident our number of publications is near the bottom of this list, and the top ranked schools publish significantly more than we do. These numbers are not normalized by the size of the departments.

#+Caption: Historical number of publications for approximately the top 10 ChemE departments, including CMU. label:fig-top10
[[./redone-top-10-publications.png]]

A comparison of the number of publications from CMU-ChemE and approximately the next 10 departments is shown in Figure ref:fig-next10. We are near the top of this plot, but there are a notable number of schools that publish more than us, but which are currently ranked lower.

#+Caption: Historical number of publications for approximately the next 10 ChemE departments, including CMU. label:fig-next10
[[./redone-next-10-publications.png]]

In the next sections, we examine the publications from each department for the year of 2014, and break out the top journals each department publishes in, as well as the number of publications from the top publishing faculty at each institution, and the number of citations the 2014 publications have to date.

** 2014 publications by department

What stands out from this analysis is that

- the top ten departments are writing more papers than we are
- Those papers are going to higher impact journals
- Those papers are getting cited a lot more
- In the top five deparments, the top 10 faculty are writing 10 or more papers per year.
